nodes.text: Psadan was the language of the Psadan people from Wayland. The other intelligent species from Wayland, the Myneyrsh, also used Psadan as a second language.
Similarly, most Psadans were fluent in both Psadan and Myneyrsh languages, although they were only literate in their own language.
Psadan language consisted of grunts, groans and deep vocalizations. There was no written form of this language, so all the history of the Psadan people was kept orally.
